name: Open the window
description:
-pressed mouse left button to open the window

-pressed play button to let time pass

-pressed weather button to see different view.

~~~~~~~~~

No matter where you are, which city you stay.

 You closed windows and doors, maybe you are busy with your jobs, or you are still upset about your last relationship, or you are wrestling with your creation. At this moment, put down all the things for a while, opening the window, what you see may surprise you. 

Just let time pass and enjoy the nature.

music used with ukulele

made forBigFestiveJam

18December2017
